'''Dr. Edith's Transport Request''' is a [[Random Event|randomly occurring World Quest]] that can activate in certain areas within [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
# Talk to [[Dr. Edith]]
# Give the [[Bag of Goods|goods]] to [[Dr. Livingstone]]

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}
==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Help Dr. Edith take something to Dr. Livingstone}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Dr. Edith)
:'''Dr. Edith:''' Traveler! Fancy meeting you here. I'm sure you are very busy, as always.
:'''Dr. Edith:''' But I just need a moment of your time. Could you give this to {{Color|buzzword|Dr. Livingstone}} for me?
:'''Dr. Edith:''' I was planning to deliver it myself but something else came up...
:{{DIcon}} I'll handle it.
::'''Dr. Edith:''' Luckily I have you to help. I am very grateful.
:{{DIcon}} Sorry, I'm dealing with something else right now.
::'''Dr. Edith:''' Okay then. To be fair, you do seem to be getting more on your plate each day!
:;(Does not accept the quest)
----
;(Deliver the item to Dr. Livingstone)
:'''Dr. Livingstone:''' Hmm, I wonder why my delivery hasn't arrived...
:'''Dr. Livingstone:''' Traveler! How can I help?
:{{DIcon}} You must be waiting for these.
:'''Dr. Livingstone:''' Oh! I never expected you to be the one delivering this!
:'''Dr. Livingstone:''' This is a huge help. Please, take these.
{{Dialogue end}}
